-  UITabBarController.MinimizeBehavior 

Enumeration# UITabBarController.MinimizeBehavior

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
enum MinimizeBehavior
```

## [Topics](/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController/MinimizeBehavior#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController/MinimizeBehavior#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case automatic`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/minimizebehavior/automatic)Resolves to the system default minimize behavior.[`case never`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/minimizebehavior/never)The tab bar does not minimize.[`case onScrollDown`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/minimizebehavior/onscrolldown)The tab bar minimizes when scrolling down, and expands when scrolling back up.[`case onScrollUp`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/minimizebehavior/onscrollup)The tab bar minimizes when scrolling up, and expands when scrolling back down. Recommended if the scroll view content is aligned to the bottom.### [Initializers](/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController/MinimizeBehavior#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/minimizebehavior/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController/MinimizeBehavior#relationships)

### [Customizing the tab bar behavior](/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarController/MinimizeBehavior#Customizing-the-tab-bar-behavior)

[`var delegate: (any UITabBarControllerDelegate)?`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/delegate)The tab bar controllerâ€™s delegate object.[`protocol UITabBarControllerDelegate`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontrollerdelegate)A set of methods you implement to customize the behavior of a tab bar.[`var tabBarMinimizeBehavior: UITabBarController.MinimizeBehavior`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller/tabbarminimizebehavior)Defines the minimize behavior for the tab bar, if it is supported.
